body:
Chris Jessee wrote:


> Hi,
>
> Is there any file format interoperability between Radiance and  
> Maxwell. (http://www.maxwellrender.com/)
> Maxwell makes very pretty pictures but I see no way to capture the  
> lighting data from an image or scene and wondered if there are any  
> plans to make some file interchange possible.


Hi Chris,


I don't think that Maxwell saves files in an HDR format, so I'm not sure 
how that kind of info could be shared.  I've also inquired with 
NextLimit about the possibility of illiminance & luminance info being 
extracted from the program and only gotten vague replies in return.  
Dunno what's going on there, really.


- Rob
___
